mapper.select:
select , b.b_name as BName from
left join tb_billing_type b on b.b_id = g.b_id where g.data_stat = '0' and g.goods_id = #{goodsId}

select g.goods_id, g.goods_name, g.spu_code, g.ecom_code, g.cat_id, g.goods_type, g.unit, g.weight, g.default_sku_code, g.market_enable, g.brief, g.have_params, g.have_spec, g.is_disabled, g.ponumber, g.goods_sord, g.goods_weight, g.grade, g.is_hot, g.goods_img, g.data_stat, g.remarks, g.create_user, g.update_user, g.create_time, g.update_time, g.lock_version, p.goods_price, p.pic_url from tb_ecom_goods g, tb_ecom_cat_goods_role r, tb_ecom_goods_category c, tb_ecom_goods_category c2, tb_ecom_goods_product p where c2.cat_id = c.parent_id and c.cat_id = r.cat_id and r.goods_id = g.goods_id and g.default_sku_code = p.sku_code and g.data_stat = '0' and c.data_stat = '0' and r.data_stat = '0' and c2.data_stat = '0' and p.data_stat = '0' and g.market_enable = '1' and c2.cat_id = #{parentcatid} and g.ecom_code = #{ecomcode}
and c.cat_id = #{catId}

SELECT G.GOODS_ID, G.GOODS_NAME, G.SPU_CODE, G.ECOM_CODE, G.CAT_ID, G.GOODS_TYPE, G.UNIT, G.WEIGHT, G.DEFAULT_SKU_CODE, G.MARKET_ENABLE, G.BRIEF, G.HAVE_PARAMS, G.HAVE_SPEC, G.IS_DISABLED, G.PONUMBER, G.GOODS_SORD, G.GOODS_WEIGHT, G.GRADE, G.IS_HOT, G.GOODS_IMG, G.DATA_STAT, G.REMARKS, G.CREATE_USER, G.UPDATE_USER, G.CREATE_TIME, G.UPDATE_TIME, G.LOCK_VERSION, P.GOODS_PRICE, P.PIC_URL FROM TB_ECOM_GOODS G, TB_ECOM_GOODS_BILLING B, TB_ECOM_GOODS_PRODUCT P WHERE B.GOODS_ID = G.GOODS_ID AND G.DEFAULT_SKU_CODE = P.SKU_CODE AND G.DATA_STAT = '0' AND B.DATA_STAT = '0' AND P.DATA_STAT = '0' AND G.MARKET_ENABLE = '1'
AND B.B_ID = #{bId}

Select g.GOODS_ID, g.GOODS_NAME, g.SPU_CODE, g.ECOM_CODE, g.CAT_ID, g.GOODS_TYPE, g.UNIT, g.WEIGHT, g.DEFAULT_SKU_CODE, g.MARKET_ENABLE, g.BRIEF, g.HAVE_PARAMS, g.HAVE_SPEC, g.IS_DISABLED, g.PONUMBER, g.GOODS_SORD, g.GOODS_WEIGHT, g.GRADE, g.IS_HOT, g.GOODS_IMG, p.PRODUCT_ID, p.PAGE_TITLE, p.GOODS_PRICE From tb_ecom_goods g ,tb_ecom_goods_product p where g.goods_id=p.goods_id and p.PRODUCT_ID=#{productId}

Select g.GOODS_ID, g.GOODS_NAME, g.SPU_CODE, g.ECOM_CODE, g.CAT_ID, g.GOODS_TYPE, g.UNIT, g.WEIGHT, g.DEFAULT_SKU_CODE, g.MARKET_ENABLE, g.BRIEF, g.HAVE_PARAMS, g.HAVE_SPEC, g.IS_DISABLED, g.PONUMBER, g.GOODS_SORD, g.GOODS_WEIGHT, g.GRADE, g.IS_HOT, g.GOODS_IMG, p.PRODUCT_ID, p.PAGE_TITLE, p.GOODS_PRICE From tb_ecom_goods g Left Join tb_ecom_goods_product p On p.goods_id=g.goods_id And p.sku_code=g.DEFAULT_SKU_CODE where g.GOODS_ID=#{goodsId}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_ECOM_ORDER_PRODUCT_ITEM ITEM LEFT JOIN TB_ECOM_PLATF_SHOP_ORDER PSO ON ITEM.S_ORDER_ID = PSO.S_ORDER_ID WHERE 1=1 AND ITEM.PRODUCT_ID IN (SELECT P.PRODUCT_ID FROM TB_ECOM_GOODS_PRODUCT P WHERE P.GOODS_ID = #{goodsId}) AND PSO.SUB_ORDER_STATUS = '14'
